page.title: 08ST.MARY'S CHURCH(CONT.)
page.content: IN THE CHANCEL THERE IS A NORMAN ARCHWAY. WE KNOW IT IS NORMAN BECAUSE IT IS ROUND AND NOT POINTED. THERE ARE SOME ALTAR RAILS IN THE CHANCEL WHICH ARE ABOUT 400 YEARS OLD.THE STAINED GLASS WINDOW IN THE CHANCEL IS A PICTURE OF MARY HOLDING JESUS,THE THREE WISE MEN KNEELING, OFFERING GIFTS TO JESUS, AND JOSEPH STANDING BESIDE MARY.THERE IS A SEAT IN THE CHANCEL FOR THE SQUIRE. IN THE WALL OF THE CHANCEL THERE ARE TWO ACOUSTIC JARS LIKE MICROPHONES AND ONLY 9 OTHER CHURCHES IN ENGLAND HAVE THEM.THERE ARE NO ELECTRIC LIGHTS IN THE CHANCEL BECAUSE THE SQUIRE DIDNT LIKE THEM. IN THE TOWER THERE ARE THREE BELLS BUT ONLY ONE IS USED.THE SHOPKEEPERS WIFE,MRS. MORSE, RINGS THE BELL. BY KAREN FOX & ANGELA PECK.
